member.name: M:Rgp.TvSeries.API.Controllers.V1.TvSeries.TvSeriesController.Post(Rgp.TvSeries.Application.V1.Commands.Create.CreateTvSeriesCommand)
member.param: The TV Series JSON represetation you want to create
member.returns: Returns an object of type DefaultResult that could be a SuccessResult or FailureResult containing information about the request
member.response: Returns a SuccessResult with the ID of the new TV Series in the data field.
Returns a FailureResult with a list of errors.
Returns a FailureResult with a list of errors.
